parameters.name: GroupByKey
parameters.description:
The dimension by which the queried resources are grouped. Valid values:

- ResourceType: The resource type.

- RegionId: The region.

- ResourceGroupId: The resource group ID.

parameters.name: IncludeDeletedResources
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to include deleted resources. Valid values:

- true

- false

parameters.name: SearchExpression
parameters.description: The search keyword. Resource Center filters the search results based on relevance.
